name: Tower of Aeor
description:
Tower of Aeor is a fast-paced, single-player roguelite with an emphasis on tactical use of spells and arena style fighting. As the player, you fight your way through waves of enemies while gathering resources that you can use to upgrade your skills both temporarily and permanently. 

The prototype was made as part of the Making Games course on the Game Design education at ITU as a semester-end project and was in development for a total of 7 weeks.  See credits in game for more information on the students involved.
